StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [RCTAPI_GetEventSubjectDataPartRecent]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@edipi varchar(10), @cutO.BeginDate date = NULL AS
--[dbo].[RCTAPI_GetEventSubjectDataPartRecent] 1266694055 --DECLARE @edipi varchar(10) --SET @edipi = 1266694055
SET NOCOUNT ON SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
DECLARE @result varchar(max)
IF @cutO.BeginDate IS NULL BEGIN SET @cutO.BeginDate = DATEADD(DAY, -62, GETDATE()) END
SELECT TOP 1 u.FirstName ,u.LastName ,rp.rowguid AS Recrui.ngPersonGuid ,ro.ORGANIZATION_ID ,ro.rowguid as OrgGuid INTO #Recruiter FROM UserMgmt.dbo.[User] u INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.PERSON p ON u.FirstName = p.FIRST_NAME AND u.LastName=p.LAST_NAME INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION ro ON u.Sta.on_OrgUnitID = ro.OrgUnitId INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_PERSON rp ON rp.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID = p.PERSON_ID AND rp.ORGANIZATION_ID = ro.ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE Dis.nguishedName like '%' + @edipi AND u.IsAc.ve = 1 AND rp.ORGANIZATION_ID = ro.ORGANIZATION_ID ORDER BY LastAc.vityDate DESC
SET @result = ( SELECT es.[Id] AS eventSubjectId ,es.[EventId] AS eventId ,es.[SubjectId] AS subjectId ,es.[SubjectName] AS subjectName ,(CASE WHEN s.Name = 'List Scheduling' THEN es.SubjectId ELSE null END) AS schoolGuid ,(CASE WHEN (s.Name = 'HS/CC Visit' OR s.Name = 'List Scheduling' ) THEN es.SubjectId ELSE null END) AS schoolPro.leGuid ,(CASE WHEN s.Name = 'PAC' THEN es.SubjectId ELSE null END) AS prospectId ,(CASE WHEN (s.Name = 'MCRD' OR s.Name = 'Pool' ) THEN es.SubjectId ELSE null END) AS nwaId ,(CASE WHEN s.Name = 'IRT' THEN es.SubjectId ELSE null END) AS irtCardId ,(CASE WHEN s.Name = 'Take One' THEN es.SubjectId ELSE null END) AS takeOneLoca.onId ,(CASE WHEN s.Name = 'Media' THEN es.SubjectId ELSE null END) AS mediaCardId ,(CASE WHEN s.Name = 'Contact' THEN es.SubjectId ELSE null END) AS contactCardId ,(CASE WHEN (s.Name = 'HS/CC Visit') THEN es.SubjectId ELSE null END) AS hsccVisitCardId FROM RSSOSS.USMC.[Event] ev INNER JOIN [RSSOSS].[USMC].[EventSubject] es ON es.EventId = ev.ID INNER JOIN #Recruiter r ON ev.Organiza.onId = r.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN RSSOSS.[USMC].[EventSource] s ON s.ID = ev.EventSourceId LEFT OUTER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.[EventApproval] ap ON ev.ID = ap.ID WHERE ev.StartDate >= @cutO.BeginDate
--AND EventId in ('EE3426AE-92F9-4A8E-8A26-007EE118C9B1', '25147D61-E48A-4B38-9A77-84CB4AFDA5FE','1013D8E1-5662-40D7-8F68-D313EEE9B5A3')
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('eventSubjects'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES )
SELECT ISNULL(@result, '{"eventSubjects":[]}')
DROP TABLE #Recruiter
